characters.name: Sung Jin-Woo
characters.description: Sung Jin-Woo is the protagonist of the story. He is an E-rank hunter and is known as the weakest hunter in the world. He is a hardworking and determined person who is willing to do anything to protect his family.

equipements.name: Dagger
equipements.description: A dagger that Sung Jin-Woo uses to fight monsters.

equipements.name: Armor
equipements.description: A set of armor that Sung Jin-Woo uses to protect himself from monsters.

abilities.name: Shadow Exchange
abilities.description: Sung Jin-Woo can switch places with his shadow.

abilities.name: Shadow Extraction
abilities.description: Sung Jin-Woo can extract shadows from monsters and use them to fight.

characters.name: Monkey D. Luffy
characters.description: Monkey D. Luffy is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and is known for his rubber-like abilities after eating the Gomu Gomu no Mi Devil Fruit. He dreams of finding the legendary One Piece treasure and becoming the Pirate King.

equipements.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
equipements.description: The Devil Fruit that gives Luffy rubber-like abilities.

abilities.name: Gum-Gum Pistol
abilities.description: Luffy stretches his arm and delivers a powerful punch.

abilities.name: Gum-Gum Gatling
abilities.description: Luffy rapidly punches his opponent with incredible speed.

characters.name: Geralt of Rivia
characters.description: Geralt of Rivia is a monster hunter, also known as a Witcher, mutated to have superhuman abilities and trained to fight monstrous creatures. He travels the Continent slaying beasts and searching for his adopted daughter, Ciri.

equipements.name: Steel Sword
equipements.description: A sword used to slay non-magical creatures.

equipements.name: Silver Sword
equipements.description: A sword used to slay magical creatures.

equipements.name: Witcher's Medallion
equipements.description: A medallion that vibrates in the presence of magic.

abilities.name: Witcher Signs
abilities.description: Geralt can cast magical signs including Igni (fire), Quen (shield), and Aard (telekinesis).

abilities.name: Enhanced Senses
abilities.description: Geralt has enhanced senses, reflexes, and strength due to Witcher mutations.
